title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin tears down the Lakers after they are officially eliminated from the playoffs and why they can't fool themselves into thinking this will be an easy fix in the offseason. He reacts to Tiger Woods announcing he plans to play in the Masters this week and why Woods' greatest achievement of his career will be on display this weekend. He tells you which 2 NFL teams are falling behind in the race to stay in contention for a Super Bowl. Plus, long time author Jeff Benedict joins the show to explain why Tiger still has a chance to win the Masters as he continues to recover from a major car accident. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
